dcterms:creator: Q. Garrido
L. Najman
Y. Lecun
dcterms:description: The 3DIEBench dataset has been created specifically to be a hard yet controlled test-bed for invariant and equivariant methods. The dataset consists of 52,472 3D objects across 55 classes of 3D objects from ShapeNetCorev2 posed in 50 different views as well as the latent information of the view.
dcterms:title: 3DIEBench
